name: Lou Cuomo (ex-NCR)
text: Having worked in Technology & After Sales Service for 35 years, I have had the opportunity to work with many accomplished and highly talented people. I had the pleasure of Luke being an integral player supporting my organization. I have no doubt that Luke's professional experience led to 'Best in Class Service' company. It is with complete confidence that I recommend him on the wealth of knowledge, skill and experience in the area of After Sales Service & Support, Technical Project Services, and Vendor Management

name: Ryan K., Director of Deployments, Major ISO
text: FlexusNet saved our nationwide Toast rollout. We needed 33 techs in 12 states â€” they had everyone booked and on-site within 72 hours. Unreal response time.
